description: Built for year-round performance, these lightweight recycled polyester/spandex hike shorts are made for long, active days on the trail. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Terravia Trail Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 4.7 oz 86% recycled polyester, 14% spandex dobby with four-way stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
